Poem from Iruvar #1: உன்னோடு நான் இருந்த ஒவ்வொரு மணி துளியும் - இருவர் (1997)

Unnodu Naan Irundha Ovvoru Mani Thuliyum - Iruvar (1997)

Date: Apr 15, 2018

Iruvar is arguably one of the greatest Tamil films of all time. The vignettes, the single-shot sequences, the iconic moments at Thirumalai Nayakkar Mahal have gained a cult status over the years. Poetry when recited with a fiery passion can evoke a strong emotional response. For an amazing translation - post by Lyrical Delights.

Signing off,
Gautham Vasan
